pr_title: Resolve null value for Glue fields

timeline.bodyText: Instead of creating a new object, we can use Collections.emptyMap()

timeline.bodyText: Why is this defined so far from when it is used?

timeline.bodyText: Instead of creating a new object, we can just use Collections.emptyList().

timeline.bodyText: If tableParameters does not need to be mutable, then we can just use Collections.emptyMap()
